detailedDescription:
Manage google groups from an easy to use spreadsheet. Can be configured to run every day at a certain time, or run on demand.

The add-on looks for a sheet named "Members" within your Sheets document with two columns, "Email" and "Group". Each line represents a single group membership.

On every run, the add-on will add and remove members from groups referenced in the sheet. It will create any missing groups, but it will not delete any groups.
